attributes.action: Dental UDA's to be reviewed and new contracts to be given to dentist.
attributes.additional_details: The dental contracts and Units of dental Activity needs to be reviewed.
attributes.background: NHS Dental surgeries require to meet their (UDA) target by March 2021 if they do not meet this then they have to payback funds given to them. Seeing as half of the year they could not see patients. Now the government wants them to meet their targets during the most infectious time.
